author: Jake Thomas
title: For Some, Biden's Pledge of SCOTUS Nominee Puts Race Above Achievement

sentence: The conservative Club for Growth’s political action committee is intervening in the Republican Senate primary in Arizona, endorsing venture capitalist Blake Masters to take on Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.).
author: Max Greenwood
title: Club for Growth endorses Blake Masters in Arizona Senate race

sentence: A slightly slicker but similarly disturbing message is evident in a recent campaign ad by Peter Thiel-backed GOP candidate for Arizona's Senate seat, Blake Masters.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Rick Scott's agenda underscores the love fest between the GOP and Vladimir Putin

sentence: pic.twitter.com/5HD077MMf4 — Blake Masters (@bgmasters) February 22, 2022 Don't be fooled by the faux-innocuous assertions of cultural history or the glib tokenism of mentioning Chuck Berry.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: The real reason why the GOP loves Putin
